title: Set minimum allocation for new farms
content: New farms Will enter just with the liquidity allocation. To provide an impulse for the first month, the suggestion is to add a Minimum 5% of the farm allocation the first month of any new farm. If one farm come out and in again, that Will count as a first month again.
options: Yes, add a Minimum 5% allocation for new farms
No, let the farms with the calculated rewards only
